revised_title: The Evolution and Standardization of English Weights and Measures
tldr: This article discusses the historical development and standardization of English weights and measures, focusing on the Avoirdepois and Troy weight systems. The author examines the legal and legislative efforts to establish uniform measures and their impact on trade and commerce. The article also explores the relationship between the Avoirdepois and Troy weight systems and their respective uses in different contexts.
